alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Kingfisher; Logan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 5:55PM CDT until April 23 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR EASTERN KINGFISHER...NORTHWESTERN LOGAN AND SOUTHEASTERN GARFIELD COUNTIES... At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lovell, moving northeast at 60 mph. An additional severe storm is located southeast of Kingfisher, moving northeast at 50mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kingfisher, Crescent, Covington, Marshall, Orlando and Lovell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
